Row.Text: Your villainy is no longer tolerable in this world. I'm bringing you into custody, immediately.
Paragon City will not fall to the likes of villains such as you. That, I can guarantee.
I may be defeated today, but the Heroes of Paragon will never die. Your time will come soon...that is a promise.

Welcome to Paragon City -- the Birthplace of Tomorrow. I am the leader and sworn defender of this great city, Statesman. I hope that our nations can find a common ground, but should you choose the path of villainy, I will lead the charge to strike you down.
It's good to talk to people who won't bug me for a Task Force for a change.
Welcome, Hero.
You may want to turn off Broadcast chat while we talk. It gets a little weird sometimes.
What brings you to Atlas Park today?
And just what do you want, villain?
Oh, it's you. I was just discussing the possibility of turning you into a Task Force target.
Your soldiers are standing just outside my War Walls. Are you here to fight? If so, I'll defeat you swiftly.
Your encroachment around Paragon's borders is unacceptable. I demand you cease this immediately.
You heroes will not save the world this day. You shall merely be the first sacrifices on this, the altar of my victory!
Even the mightiest heroes could not stop me. What makes you think YOU can?
This...is...impossible...I am Recluse! I am eternal...!

And yet another pathetic simpleton masquerading as a world leader comes to my doorstep. You should know my name already -- the dread Recluse, ruler of the unstoppable Arachnos Empire! Know that your lands and your people are rightfully mine, and it will be merely a matter of time before they are claimed.
I have come to the conclusion that you are somewhat tolerable. I shall destroy you last.
Shall we visit Haven House later? That place never ceases to crack me up.
You stand before Recluse. Speak.
Speak your piece.
Give me one good reason not to tear your heart from your body this instant.
Yes, you should be extremely concerned that my four lieutenants are surrounding you.
That pathetic bunch of weaklings you call your "army" has gathered just shy of my borders. March them to their deaths! Make them entertain me!
Recluse's territory is absolute! Cease your expansions immediately!
You are unfit to rule your citizens. I shall destroy you and bring a new age of prosperity to your suffering people!
Compared to the Devouring Earth, you and your army are mere ants. Come, then! Try your best against the incarnation of power itself!
You fool...you absolute fool! I was the only one who could save this world from the menace that was to come...you've doomed us all!

Praetoria extends its grace to you, leader. Some dare call me Tyrant, but you are intelligent enough to know that I am Marcus Cole, the Emperor of Praetoria and the hope of mankind against the Devouring Earth menace.
Were you not the leader of your own great nation already, I would be happy to make you a Praetor.
Praetoria welcomes you, friend.
Welcome again to the Magisterium.
Do not mind the Seers. The mental probing is a strange feeling for an outsider, but you should get used to it.
You stain the Magisterium with your presence. Say your piece and leave.
I have suffered your existence nearly to my limit. I advise that you leave immediately before my patience wavers.
I see your soldiers standing outside our borders in wait, like the Devouring Earth waiting in ambush. Is it a battle you're seeking?
On my authority as Emperor, I demand that you cease expansion near the lands of Praetoria at once.

Oh, but it is hilarious to think that you have actually defeated me. This is all part of the plan...this machine you think is me, is merely a decoy! Perhaps I'll begin to take more direct control of one of the other Civilizations I've been manipulating...

I planned for this meeting to happen. You should be well aware of me and my reputation -- Lord Nemesis, the Prince of Automatons and the most brilliant mind on this planet! I have every move my army will make planned out from now until 2050 AD...can you say the same?

Self Designation: Hro'Dtohz. Self Title: Leader(Rikti Empire). Detest: Humans. Suggestion: Improve Military. Earnest Desire: Thrilling Wars. Ultimate Desire: Destroy Humanity!

Fatal Judgmental Error: Underestimation (Humans). Rikti Civilization Status: Ruins, Death. Query: Self: Enslavement? Response to Affirmative Answer: Never! Preferable Outcome: Execution. Even While(Rikti == Destroyed), Hro'Dtohz Spirit: Undying!
